Certificate in Hospitality and Tourism

 COURSE DURATION:

  • 1 Year
 

ADMISSION REQUIREMENTS:

  • You must be at least 17 years old and must have passed Grade 11 or equivalent.
  • If you have no passed Grade 11, but are over the age of 21, you may still be considered.
  • You must be able to speak, read and write English.
 

COURSE STRUCTURE:

  • Four Modules must be completed
  • You will be assessed by assignment, not exams.
  • Throughout the course and its assessments, you will need to demonstrate interpersonal, self-study, research and presentation skills.
 

COURSE CONTENT:

  • Tourism Operations – Module One
  • Hotel & Restaurant Operations – Module Two
  • Introduction to Marketing in Hospitality & Tourism – Module Three
  • Introduction to Customer Service Skills – Module Four
 

CAREER PATH: 

  • Start your working life at team member level as a:
    • Guest Support Representative
    • Hotel Receptionist
    • Assistant Travel guide
    • Porter
    • Sales Trainee
    • Hygiene Housekeeper
    • Maintenance Assistant
    • Trainee Travel Agent
    • Waiter
 

PROGRESS OPPORTUNITIES:

Progress to our Diploma programme or gain access to the first year of one of the following Universities for a degree:

OTHER MANAGEMENT PROGRAMMES IN HOSPITALITY AND TOURISM.

  Certificate in Hospitality & Tourism Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism Advanced Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism Pro-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism Post-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
